## Problem 1

import `homicide` data 
```{r message = FALSE} 
homicide_df = read_csv(file = "./data/homicide-data.csv")
```

Create a `city_state` variable

```{r}
homicide_df = 
  homicide_df |> 
    mutate(
      city_state = paste(city, state, sep = ", ")
    ) 
```
